CustomField.description: This field determines the initial phase for the Exede FFL rollout based on the billing state.
CustomField.formula: IF(Account.BillingState = 'AR', '2.1, 2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'CO', '1.1, 1.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'CT', '3.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'DC', '1.3, 3.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'DE', '1.3', IF(Account.BillingState = 'FL', '3.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'GA', '3.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'IA', '1.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'ID', '2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'IL', '1.2, 1.3, 2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'IN', '1.3, 2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'KS', '1.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'KY', '2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'LA', '2.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'MA', '2.2, 3.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'MD', '1.3', IF(Account.BillingState = 'ME', '2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'MI', '2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'MN', '1.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'MO', '1.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'MT', '1.1, 2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'NC', '3.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'ND', '1.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'NE', '1.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'NH', '2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'NJ', '1.3, 2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'NM', '3.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'NY', '3.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'OH', '1.3, 2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'OR', '2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'PA', '1.3,3.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'RI', '3.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'SC', '3.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'SD', '1.1', IF(Account.BillingState = 'TN', '2.2, 3.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'TX', '2.1, 3.1, 3.3', IF(Account.BillingState = 'UT', '2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'VA', '1.3, 3.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'WA', '2.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'WI', '1.2', IF(Account.BillingState = 'WV', '1.3', IF(Account.BillingState = 'WY', '1.1, 2.2', NULL))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: FFL Home Phase(s)
